AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: It is a sweety made of chocolate.\nPerhaps it was a different creature before, but its memory is lost.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: It is a creature transformed into Sweety by chocolate.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Crossbreed Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In extremely rare cases, crossbreeding with a different species can produce a child Sweety.\nShe was born as such a rare Sweety.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Maker Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: She was made by a company with Sweety technology.\nBut for some unknown reason, the company's manufacturing plant was destroyed and she fled the scene.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: housed Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is Sweety, once housed by humans. However, the person who had Sweety was killed by an assassin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: housed Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is Sweety, once housed by humans. Although Sweety was given the gift of a happy life, the human who owned her passed away due to life expectancy.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: volunteer Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] used to share his chocolate milk with underprivileged children of different races. This experience made her a sociable personality.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: military Sweety
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Sweety bought as food for one army from B.E.P Fairy Tech. solely working on turning chocolate milk into cakes.
